references.paper_title: Self-supervised learning of audio-visual objects from video
references.reason: This paper is foundational for self-supervised learning in audio-visual tasks, a topic directly relevant to the current work.
This early work on integrating auditory and visual information is a key precursor to the current research on AV learning.

references.paper_title: HTS-AT: A hierarchical token-semantic audio transformer for sound classification and detection
references.reason: This paper introduces HTS-AT, a significant audio transformer model that is used as a backbone in the current work.

references.paper_title: Look, listen, and attend: Co-attention network for self-supervised audio-visual representation learning
references.reason: This paper explores self-supervised learning using co-attention, a concept relevant to the Mixture of Experts approach.

references.paper_title: Vision transformers are parameter-efficient audio-visual learners
references.reason: This paper investigates parameter-efficient transfer learning for audio-visual tasks, directly addressing the problem of computational cost.
